reviews.review_msg: It was supposed to be a useful and fun course, but... Work hard won't guarantee you a good grade. He won't give you the breakdown of grades for group projects and final. He didn't know most of the students' names and never recorded the participation (wonder how he graded this part, worth 20%). If u unfortunately take with him, then good luck.

I would not recommend taking BUS 440 with Alireza Saremi. This course was supposed to be about simulation, not data collecting! What kind of person would want you to stand outside a business and gather at least 500 rows of detailed, event-level, data? Oh I know, Ali!

The course content was well-structured and presented using Arena. The hands-on approach to learning was effective. 2 group assignments and a group project, and the final exam was on modeling using Arena. Mehdi knows the content and he is very friendly with students.

Mehdi is very good in teaching DE Simulation. He is a very nice and approachable professor. He encouraged us to think critically and helped us develop a deeper understanding of simulation modeling and its limitations. This is an applied course, and the final exam is to develop simulation models using Arena. I enjoyed it very much.
Mehdi always explains things clearly, very patient and a very nice person!
Mehdi is great in teaching Simulation. So knowledgeable in this field and I learned a lot in his class.

He knows his material well and tries to be a good teacher, but straight up, he's a d*ck. He'll call you out for answers on material he hasn't covered yet and make fun of you for not knowing the answer. Somehow manages to make students that get straight A's in other OM courses feel stupid. Definitely discouraging, wish I hadn't taken it with him.
Awesome prof. Had both BUS440, and BUS473 with him. Just attend the lectures, and pick a motivated group (especially for BUS440), you will be fine. Highly recommended.

Payman doesn't know what he's teaching and so chooses not to help you. 25% of the midterms is completely new content. Finally, he makes prejudice about people's work ethic with no evidence and announces it to the class.
He is awesome. Shares real life example which makes the course more interesting. Select a good team partner as it affects your grade later on .Good luck !!!!
